title: 12/14/20 DPS-BEST OF
itunes:title: 12/14/20 DPS-BEST OF
description:
On today's Dan Patrick Show, DP recaps Week 14 in the NFL. Is there a real QB controversy in Philly? Who's the NFL MVP at this point in the season? When can we expect the Cleveland Indians to change their nicknames. We're joined by NBC's Peter King, ESPN's Sal Paolantonio, and The Plain Dealer's Terry Pluto. Plus DP shares the task that interrupted his NFL Sunday.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
